amendment.description: Amendment to the Borski amendments (A017) sought add "reproductive disorders" the list list of health effects contained in the Borski amendments.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to add reproductive disorders to the list of provisions incorporated into the Borski amendments.

action.text: Amendment (A018) offered by Mr. Volkmer to the Borski amendment (A017).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Volkmer amendment (A018) Failed by recorded vote: 114 - 312 (Roll no. 60).
